column4: Why can't I seem to find a version of libgtk-dev newer than 2.0 when the 2.6 libraries is installed?
you should look at the package version, dude
Well, I know 2.0 < 2.6. Isn't that what I am looking at? The version? :P
why the hell is it labelled 2.0 then?
the package name contains the SONAME, which is indeed 2.0
the version is in the Version
